posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
EDITED TO ADD: I'D BE WILLING TO TAKE ANY BACK IF THE MATTY AND JOHNSON ARE IN SGC HOLDERS. 

I would like to purchase 2 T-206 HOFer classic poses for my collection.

1) T206 Walter Johnson (portrait) graded SGC 10-40 (1-3).  PSA, SGC, or BVG are all fine.  Looking for great eye appeal and no paper loss on the back.  I need a W. Johnson with a back I'm missing from the list below. 

2) T206 Christy Mathewson (portrait) graded SGC 10-40 (1-3). PSA, SGC, or BVG are all fine.  Looking for great eye appeal and no paper loss on the back.  I need a Matty with a back I'm missing from the list below.

I can pay via check or PAYPAL.

Email me with what you have (scans and prices), and I'll get back to you.  

My email: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

EDITED: I WOULD LIKE TO PURCHASE THESE TWO HOFers IN ANY BACK.

MY LIST OF MISSING BACKS (and I realize these two HOFers cannot be found with some of these backs, but this is my list):

9. Hindu (Red) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
11. Blank Back
17. American Beauty - Series 460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
18. Cycle - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
21. American Beauty (no Frame) - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
22. American Beauty (with Frame) - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
23. Cycle - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
25. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
26. Old Mill (Black) - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
30. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
31. Sovereign - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
33. Sweet Caporal - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
35. Piedmont - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
37. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY
38. Piedmont - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA 


Please help if you can and make me a happy collector!
